text: Jeremy "Spike" Cohen (born June 28, 1982) is an American activist, businessman, and podcaster. He was the Libertarian Party's nominee for Vice President of the United States in the 2020 election. Cohen ran with Vermin Supreme for President and Vice President in the 2020 Libertarian Presidential primaries, and was actively involved in campaigning. In 2020 Supreme lost the primary to Jo Jorgensen, but Cohen decided to still compete for the vice- presidential Libertarian nomination. He won the vice presidential nomination. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:2020 United States vice-presidential candidates Category:American political activists Category:Businesspeople from South Carolina Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:People from Myrtle Beach, South Carolina Category:Businesspeople from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Libertarian Party (United States) politicians
title: Spike Cohen
